name: C-3PO (See-Threepio)
Lore: 'Cybot Galactica 3PO human-cyborg relations droid. Fluent in over six million forms of communication. 112 years old. Has never been memorywiped... as far as he knows.',
Text: 'Total power at same site is +2 for each of your droid/Rebel pairs present, including C-3PO. R2-D2 is forfeit +2 when present.',
